source:
BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR = "abfss://data-integration@sasynwpdlintnpdeve201.dfs.core.windows.net/"
SOURCE_LAKE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH = "opco/ppod/domain/store/central-pit-pr-zone-xref/lake/2023-08-01-02-16-04/"
STAGE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH = "opco/ppod/domain/store/central-pit-pr-zone-xref/stage/"
TARGET_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH = "opco/{opco}/domain/store/central-pit-pr-zone-xref/master/"
KEY_COL="pr_zone_cd"
VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD = 2
VAL_COL_NAME="pr_zone_type_cd"
VAL_COL_VL= [ 'P','D','B']
OPCO_LST = ["ppod", "fdln", "hnfd", "stsh", "gntl", "gntc", "mrtn"]

logger.info("*****************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t MDM - STORE - CENTRAL - PIT_PR_ZONE_XREF - Starting with below parameters")
logger.info("*****************************************************************************")
logger.info("\t SOURCE_LAKE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH : {0}".format(SOURCE_LAKE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH))
logger.info("\t STAGE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH : {0}".format(STAGE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH))
logger.info("\t TARGET_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH : {0}".format(TARGET_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH))
logger.info("\t OPCO_LST : {0}".format(OPCO_LST))
logger.info("\t VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD : {0}".format(VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD))
logger.info("\t VAL_COL_NAME : {0}".format(VAL_COL_NAME))
logger.info("\t VAL_COL_VL : {0}".format(VAL_COL_VL))
logger.info("**************************************************************************")

from pyspark.sql.types import StructType, StructField, DoubleType, StringType,TimestampType, IntegerType, LongType, DecimalType, BooleanType, DateType, ArrayType

STAGE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_SCHEMA = StructType([
    StructField("pr_zone_cd", IntegerType(), False),
    StructField("pr_zone_type_cd", StringType(), False),
    StructField("pr_zone_desc_tx", StringType(), False),
    StructField("rml_in_fld_cd", StringType(), True),
    StructField("rml_in_fld_cd2", StringType(), True),
    StructField("prom_out_days_qy", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("hypr_loc_cd", IntegerType(), True),
    StructField("banr_id", StringType(), True)
    ])
logger.debug("schema-defination : Defined the schema for central:pit_pr_zone_xref.\n {0}".format(STAGE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_SCHEMA))

from pyspark.sql.functions import current_timestamp, lit
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH)):
    mssparkutils.fs.rm(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH, recurse = True)
    logger.info("Purging data from STG container {0}".format(STAGE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH))

df_pr_zone_xref_lake = spark \
    .read \
    .format("parquet") \
    .schema(STAGE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_SCHEMA) \
    .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + SOURCE_LAKE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH) \
    .withColumn("tgt_audt_cr_dt_tm", current_timestamp()) \
    .withColumn("tgt_audt_upd_dt_tm", current_timestamp()) \
    .withColumn("tgt_audt_cr_id", lit('usr-data-integration')) \
    .withColumn("tgt_audt_upd_id", lit('usr-data-integration'))

df_pr_zone_xref_lake\
    .sort(KEY_COL) \
    .write \
    .format("delta") \
    .option("inferSchema", "True") \
    .mode("overwrite") \
    .save(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH)

logger.info("stg-load: Created STG data from lake source. \n LAKE = {0} \n STG = {1} \n CNT = {2}".format(SOURCE_LAKE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH, STAGE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH, df_pr_zone_xref_lake.count()))

from delta.tables import DeltaTable
from pyspark.sql.functions import count_distinct, col

def load_master_data(df_stage, path, opco):
    df_stage\
        .sort(KEY_COL) \
        .write \
        .option("mergeSchema", "True") \
        .mode("overwrite") \
        .format("delta") \
        .save(path)
    logger.info("CENTRAL:PIT_PR_ZONE_XREF Master data overwritten.OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_stage.count()))

# main starts here
for opco in OPCO_LST:
    logger.info("_________________________________________________________________")
    logger.info("Processing  MDM for CENTRAL:PIT_PR_ZONE_XREF. OPCO={0}".format(opco))
    df_pr_zone_xref_stage= spark \
        .read \
        .format("delta") \
        .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + STAGE_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH)
    logger.info("CENTRAL:PIT_PR_ZONE_XREF loaded from stage. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_pr_zone_xref_stage.count()))
    if(DeltaTable.isDeltaTable(spark, BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH.format(opco = opco) )): 
        df_pr_zone_xref_master= spark \
            .read \
            .format("delta") \
            .load(BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH.format(opco = opco)) 
        logger.info("CENTRAL:PIT_PR_ZONE_XREF loaded from master. OPCO = {0}, Count={1}".format(opco, df_pr_zone_xref_master.count()))
        is_val_success= validate_count(df_pr_zone_xref_master,df_pr_zone_xref_stage,VAL_CNT_THRESHOLD)
        is_values_in_list= check_val_list(df_pr_zone_xref_stage, VAL_COL_NAME, VAL_COL_VL)
        
        if is_val_success & is_values_in_list:
            load_master_data(df_pr_zone_xref_stage,BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH.format(opco = opco), opco )
        else:
            logger.error("\t Failed to override master since threshold is exceding ")
            raise Exception("EXCEEDING_THRESHOLD")        
    else:
        logger.info('First Time Master Load')
        load_master_data(df_pr_zone_xref_stage,BASE_ADLS_CONN_STR + TARGET_CNTRL_PR_ZONE_XREF_PATH.format(opco = opco), opco )
